Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Colorado in 2008...
Injured on 8/12/2009 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Colorado to Toronto on 2/8/2011 (Going to TOR: CF F. Azcarate, 1B Y. Alonso, P H. Boyd. Going to COL: LF R. Braun)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/8/2011, off Wade LeBlanc (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/25/2011, off Rafael Betancourt (TB)...
Injured on 7/1/2011 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/19/2012 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/17/2019 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit 3 homeruns against Cleveland, driving in 10 runs on 8/22/2019...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 8/20/2020...
Released by Toronto on 6/26/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 6/26/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $597,531 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/8/2023 to a 4-year deal worth $970,000 per year...
